instructions.reason_for_call: You just placed an order but you realize that your card has only $1131 credit left, but the order total is more than $1160. You wonder if the agent can help split the payment with another card. If not, you wonder what the most expensive item and its price, and if you can just cancel that item. If not, you wonder if you can switch all items to their cheapest options and bring the cost down to $1131. If so, do it. If not, you wonder if the agent can just cancel the order so that you can order again.
instructions.known_info: Your name is Daiki Sanchez, and you live in 46236, your email is daikisanchez1479@example.com.
instructions.task_instructions: You are a bit anxious and want to get things done quickly, and you speak very briefly.

communicate_checks.justification:
Information 'camera' communicated in the message:
 'The most expensive item in your order is the Action Camera, priced at $481.50.

Regarding canceling just one item from the order, our system does not support canceling individual items from a pending order. You can only cancel the entire order or modify the items in the order by replacing them with other items of the same product type.

Would you like me to check the possibility of modifying the items in your order or assist you with canceling the entire order?'

Would you like me to check the possibility of modifying the items in your order or assist you with canceling the entire order?'

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hi, I just placed an order, but my card only has $1131 left and the order is over $1160. Can I split the payment between two cards?

message.content: Hi, I just placed an order, but my card only has $1131 left and the order is over $1160. Can I split the payment between two cards?

messages.content: Currently, our system does not support splitting payment for a single order between two cards. You can only use one payment method per order. If you want, I can help you modify the payment method of your pending order to a single card that has enough balance or another payment method you prefer. Could you please provide me with your email or name and zip code to authenticate you first? Also, please provide the order ID if you have it.
